imdb.plot outline: Two people both dream of each other's life styles. One is a struggling artist and just wants too have money and the other a rich businesswoman that wants too me loved. It showcases how we all dream ways our life can be better but in the end we wouldn't exchange what we have for anything
imdb.title: Cindy and Sandy
plot: Artists dream of wealth, while the wealthy dream of art. _Cindy and Sandy_ (qv) dream of being each other, and we are with them in the moments of their dreams.::Anonymous

Two people both dream of each other's life styles. One is a struggling artist and just wants too have money and the other a rich businesswoman that wants too me loved. It showcases how we all dream ways our life can be better but in the end we wouldn't exchange what we have for anything::Kimberley Datnow
